game.name: Mia Castle Adventure
game.description:
This adventure challenge is going to be very unique. Are you ready to make your presence here and show off the world that you can deal with new challenge with a great amount of confidence? Join Mia Castle Adventure game and be prepared to kill all the monsters that you see on her way! Visiting the ancient castle maintained its location on the western edge of the country is one of the most important dreams Miya had. Luckily, she has got an opportunity to make it come true. 
She reached to her desired place of research where some uninvited monsters were already waiting for her. Now your job in this action-packed game is to help girl eliminate all the deadly monsters from the area. It will be in your hand how to make her mysterious castle journey so special to her. Destroy all the monsters you see coming downward from the top bottom of the screen and complete all missions to surprise her during the Egypt tourism!
There is no need to be scared of these deadly monsters that can be easily killed by just clicking on them. You would have six lives to choose so be careful and try to at least one life till you complete all levels in this point and click kids game. Do not bother if you get bored, you can feel free to try out more adventure challenges on atmegame.com and get a chance to enjoy for hours in our new online games. Good luck to have fun without taking any tension!!
